original: Lindblom, Cyril Enar Gustaf, advokat, Linköping, f. 9/5/00 i Molkom, Värml. 1., av prov :iäk. Jonas Gustaf L. o. Gerda Charlotta Wessman. G. 30 m. Karin Mallmén. Barn: Arne f. 31, Gunilla 38. — Stud:ex. i Karlstad 17, jur. kand. i Upps. 22. E. o. not. i Svea hovr. 22, tingstjg. i Älvdals o. Ny eds doms. 23-26, tjg. som e. o. not. i Göta hovr. 26-27, anst. å Blomberg & Granqvists Adv:byrå i Karlstad 22-23, å Gust. Holms Jurid. Byrå i Jönköp. 27-30, egen adv :verk-samh. i Linköp. sed. 30. Tf. ombudsman h. Linköp. Sparbank 37, ord. dito 38. Led. av Sv:es adv:samf. sed. 30.
translated: Lindblom, Cyril Enar Gustaf, lawyer, Linköping, b. 9/5/00 in Molkom, Värml. 1st child of district judge Jonas Gustaf L. and Gerda Charlotta Wessman. Married on 30 in Karin Mallmén. Children: Arne b. 31, Gunilla b. 38. — Passed the university entrance exam in Karlstad in 17, received a law degree in Uppsala in 22. Started as a non-permanent notary in Svea Court of Appeal in 22, served as a county court clerk in Älvdal and Ny eds district courts from 23-26, worked as a non-permanent notary in Göta Court of Appeal from 26-27. Employed at Blomberg & Granqvist's Law Firm in Karlstad from 22-23, at Gust. Holm's law office in Jönköping from 27-30, and has been running his own law firm in Linköping since 30. Acting representative for the Linköping Savings Bank in 37, appointed as a regular representative in 38. Member of the Swedish Bar Association since 30.

workExperience.namedPosition: Älvdals o. Ny eds District Courts
